Sentence: Angela's twin brothers, Pedro Vicario and Pablo Vicario, ask her (Angela) who took her (Angela) virginity, and she (Angela) tells them that Santiago Nasar did

Pedro and Pablo Vicario were sitting in the local milk-shop, which was en route to the dock, so that they could see Santiago Nasar either going or returning in order to track him (Nasar) down and kill him (Nasar)
After their release from prison, Pablo proceeded to marry his (Pablo) betrothed, Prudencia Cotes, and Pedro went back into the armed forces
